data.title: Leslie M. Stover Middle School
data.meta_description: Teacher Information - Leslie M. Stover Middle School
data.text:
Phone: (803) 438-7414

Email:

Degrees and Certifications:

BS in Mathematics with Minor in Education Master of Education in Educational Leadership

Mrs. Amy Reynolds

Welcome to seventh grade! I am so excited to share this journey with you. My name is Amy Reynolds and I have been in education for 22 years. I taught middle school for 18 years in Lancaster, South Carolina before serving two years as an Assistant Principal in Greenville, North Carolina.

I am from Newberry, South Carolina. I earned my Bachelorâ€™s Degree in Mathematics with a minor in Education from Newberry College. I also earned my Master of Education in Educational Leadership from Winthrop University. I am married to Sam and we have one son, Cameron (19). In addition, I have a few fur babies named Lilly, Maggie, Abbie, and Jasper who keep me company and provide me with lots of stories to tell. When I am not at school, I enjoy walking, listening to music, and baking goodies for family and friends. Being surrounded by family is one of my favorite things!

I look forward to working with you and your child at Stover! If you need to reach me at any time, please email me amy.reynolds@kcsdschools.net or call me at school.
